All material herein is being released using the Open Gaming License Version 1.0a. You should read and understand the terms of that license before using this material.
Within this XML document, all information is Open Game Content unless noted otherwise. Open Game Content is indicated by the LegalStatus attribute of any tag. This can have values of "open", "closed", or "pi" (for Product Identity), where "open" is the default. All child tags are assumed to share the same value as their most recent parent tag.

(e) "Product Identity" means product and product line names, logos and identifying marks including trade dress; artifacts; creatures characters; stories, storylines, plots, thematic elements, dialogue, incidents, language, artwork, symbols, designs, depictions, likenesses, formats, poses, concepts, themes and graphic, photographic and other visual or audio representations; names and descriptions of characters, spells, enchantments, personalities, teams, personas, likenesses and special abilities; places, locations, environments, creatures, equipment, magical or supernatural abilities or effects, logos, symbols, or graphic designs; and any other trademark or registered trademark clearly identified as Product identity by the owner of the Product Identity, and which specifically excludes the Open Game Content; (f) "Trademark" means the logos, names, mark, sign, motto, designs that are used by a Contributor to identify itself or its products or the associated products contributed to the Open Game License by the Contributor; (g) "Use", "Used" or "Using" means to use, distribute, copy, edit, format, modify, translate and otherwise create Derivative Material of Open Game Content. lookup-table.lookup-entry: Door or trapdoor trigger
Switch or latch trigger
Trip wire or floor pressure plate trigger
Magical trigger

%CC% %CS% stand above the portal on a ledge %DS% up. They stand by a crate rocks near the ledge. Upon spoting an intruder, they push the crate so it crashes down upon them. Dexterity saving throw (DC 12) or take 2d6 bludgeoning damage. They then jump down from the ledge to attack, apply falling damage to each creature.

%CC% %CS% stand above the portal on a ledge %DS% up. They hold a crate full of rocks between them. Upon spoting an intruder, they drop the crate so it crashes down upon them. Dexterity saving throw (DC 12) or take 2d6 bludgeoning damage. They then jump down from the ledge to attack, apply falling damage to each of the creatures.

%CC% %CS% stand in an alcove to the sides of the door. One is tied by a rope to a suspended crate of rocks. Upon spoting an intruder, it moves triggering the crate to drop so it crashes down upon the intruder. Dexterity saving throw (DC 12) or take 2d6 bludgeoning damage. They then step out to attack.
Flame Jet: CR 2; 1 foot wide, 50 feet long stream of flame (3d6); Reflex %RN% avoids; Search %SD%.
Lightning Blast: CR 3; 5 feet wide, 50 feet long blast (3d6); Reflex %RN% avoids; Search %SD%.
Globe of Cold: CR 4; 20 foot radius sphere or hemisphere (5d6); Reflex %RN% avoids; Search %SD%.
Electrified Floor: CR 4; section of floor (3d10); Reflex %RN% for half damage; Search %SD%.
Floor Transforms into acid: CR 6; section of floor (10d6); Reflex %RD% negates; Search %SD%. Note: Successful save means character dives to safety in time.
Illusion over Spiked Pit (%DN% deep): CR 3 (+1 per 20 feet of fall); %PT%, %AN% melee (1d4 spike attacks for 1d4+2 points of damage per successful hit); Reflex %RN% avoids; Search %SD%.
Air Sucked out of room: CR 5; Room takes 4 rounds to decompress and once decompressed air refills in 1d4+1 rounds. Search %SD%.
Pit Trap (%DD% Deep): CR 3 (+1 per 20 feet of fall); %PT%; Reflex %RD% avoids falling; Search %SD%. Clue %TCft%.
Spiked Pit Trap (%DD% Deep): CR 3 (+1 per 20 feet of fall); %PT%, %AD% melee (1d4 spikes for $d4$ points of damage per successful hit); Reflex %RD% avoids falling; Search %SD%. Clue %TCft%.
Tilting Floor Pit Trap (%DD% Deep): CR 3 (+1 per 20 feet of fall); %PT%; Reflex %RD% avoids falling; Search %SD%. Clue %TCft%.

Spiked Tilting Floor Pit Trap (%DD% Deep): CR 3 (+1 per 20 feet of fall); %AD% mele22e (1d4 spikes for $d4$ points of damage per successful hit); %PT%; Reflex %RS% avoids falling; Search %SD%. Clues %TCft%. Activation %AT%.
Poison Needle Trap: CR 3; %AS% ranged (1d4, plus Poisoned); Reflex %RD% avoids Poisoned; Search %SD%. Activation %AT%.
Poison Dust Trap: CR 3; no attack roll necessary (1d4, plus Poisoned); Reflex %RD% avoids Poisoned; Search %SD%. Activation %AT%.
Poison Gas Trap: CR 3; no attack roll necessary (1d4, plus Poisoned); Gas remains active 1d4 rounds; Reflex %RD% avoids Poisoned; Search %SD%. Activation %AT%.
Hail of Needles: CR 3; %AS% ranged (2d4); Search %SS%. Activation %AT%.

Hail of Bowling Balls Trap: CR 3; %AD% melee 2d6/x6; Reflex %RD% avoids critical damage. Note that room may be designed to curve or ricochet the path of the sphere for 1d4 attacks. Search %SD%. Clue %TCct%. Activation %AT%.

Rolling Sphere Trap: CR 3; %AD% melee 6d6; Reflex %RD% avoids critical damage; Search %SD%. Clue %TCct%. Activation %AT%. Note: room may be designed to curve or ricochet the path of the sphere for 1d4 attacks.
Crushing Wall Trap: CR 3; no attack roll required (20d6); Search %SD%. Clue %TCct%. Activation %AT%.
Scything Blade Trap: CR 3; %AN% melee 1d8/x4; Reflex %RD% avoids critical damage; Search %SD%. Clue %TCpt%. Activation %AT%.
Falling Block Trap: CR 3; %AD% melee 6d6; Reflex %RD% avoids critical damage. Can strike all characters in two adjacent specified squares. Search %SD%. Activation %AT%.

Acid Spray Trap: CR 3; no attack roll necessary. Trap releases a spray of acid in %DS% diameter circle; Those caught in the circle take 2d10 acid damage; Reflex %RD% avoids. Search %SD%. Activation %AT%.
Flooding Room Trap: CR 3 (+1 per round of flood); no attack roll necessary (see note below); Note: Room floods in 4 rounds and drains in 1d4+1 rounds. Search %SD%. Activation %AT%.

Caltrops Trap: CR 2; %AN% melee negating armor, shield, and deflection (1 pt dmg/x3, reduced to 1/2 speed); There are scraps of clothing laying about. The shoes or boots have holes in the foot. Reflex %RN% avoids critical damage; Note: 5-ft. reach, target passes over square. Search %SN%. Clues %TCpf% Activation %AT%.
Arrow Trap: CR 2; %AN% ranged 1d6/x3; Reflex %RN% avoids critical damage; Note: 200-ft. max range, target determined randomly from those in its path. Search %SN%. Clue %TCpt%. Activation %AT%.
Spear Trap: CR 2; %AN% ranged 1d8/x3; Reflex %RN% avoids critical damage; Note: 200-ft. max range, target determined randomly from those in its path. Search %SN%. Clue %TCpt%. Activation %AT%.
Pit Trap (%DN% Deep): CR 2 (+1 per 20 feet of fall); %PT%; Reflex %RN% avoids falling; Search %SN%. Clue %TCft%.
Spiked Pit Trap (%DN% Deep): CR 2 (+1 per 20 feet of fall); %PT%, %AN% melee (1d4 spikes for $d4$ points of damage per successful hit); Reflex %RN% avoids falling; Search %SN%. Clue %TCft%.
Swinging Log Trap: CR 2; %AN% ranged (1d8/x3 crit); Search %SN%. Clue %TCct%. Activation %AT%.
Spiked Swinging Log Trap: CR 2; %AN% ranged (1d8x3, plus 1d4 spikes for 1d4+5 points of damage per spike); Reflex %RN% avoids; Search %SN%. Clue %TCct%. Activation %AT%.
Poison Needle Trap: CR 2; %AN% ranged (1x3, plus greenblood oil poison); Search %SN%. Activation %AT%.
Poison Dust Trap: CR 2; no attack roll necessary (1d4, plus %PG%); Reflex %RS% avoids gas; Search %SS%. Activation %AT%.
Poison Gas Trap: CR 2; no attack roll necessary (1d4, plus %PG%); Reflex %RS% avoids gas; Search %SN%. Activation %AT%.
Hail of Needles: CR 2; %AN% ranged (2d4); Search %SN%. Activation %AT%.

Hail of Bowling Balls Trap: CR 2; %AN% melee 2d6/x3; Reflex %RN% avoids critical damage; Search %SN%. Clue %TCct%. Activation %AT%. Note: room may be designed to curve or ricochet the path of the sphere for 1d4 rounds.

Rolling Sphere Trap: CR 2; %AN% melee 6d6; Reflex %RN% avoids critical damage; Search %SN%. Clue %TCct%. Activation %AT%. Note: room may be designed to curve or ricochet the path of the sphere for 1d4 rounds.
Scything Blade Trap: CR 2; %AN% melee 1d8/x3; Reflex %RN% avoids critical damage; Search %SN%. Clue %TCst%. Activation %AT%.
Falling Block Trap: CR 2; %AN% melee 6d6; Reflex %RN% avoids critical damage; Note: Can strike all characters in two adjacent specified squares. Search %SN%. Clue %TCct%. Activation %AT%.
Large Net Trap: CR 2; %AN% melee. Characters in 10-ft. square are grappled by net (Strength 18) if they fail a Reflex %RN%. Search %SN%. Activation %AT%.

Acid Spray Trap: CR 2; no attack roll necessary. Trap releases a spray of acid in %DS% diameter circle; Those caught in the circle take 2d10 acid damage; Reflex %RN% avoids. Search %SN%. Activation %AT%.
Flooding Room Trap: CR 2 (+1 per round of flood); no attack roll necessary (see note below); Note: Room floods in 4 rounds and drains in 1d4+1 rounds. Search %SN%. Activation %AT%.

Portcullis Trap: CR 2; %AN% melee 3d6/x2; Reflex %RN% avoids critical damage; Note: Damage applies only to those underneath the portcullis. Portcullis blocks passageway. Search %SN%. Clue %TCpt%. Activation %AT%.

Caltrops Trap: CR 1; %AS% melee negating armor, shield, and deflection ($S$/x3, reduced to 1/2 speed); Reflex %RS% avoids critical damage; Note: 5-ft. reach, target passes over square. Search %SS%. Clues %TCpf% Activation %AT%.
Arrow Trap: CR 1; %AS% ranged $S$/x2; Reflex %RS% avoids critical damage; Note: 200-ft. max range, target determined randomly from those in its path. Search %SS%. Clue %TCpt%. Activation %AT%.
Spear Trap: CR 1; %AS% ranged $S$/x2; Reflex %RS% avoids critical damage; Note: 200-ft. max range, target determined randomly from those in its path. Search %SS%. Clue %TCpt%. Activation %AT%.
Pit Trap (%DS% Deep): CR 1 (+1 per 20 feet of fall); %PT%; Reflex %RS% avoids falling; Search %SS%. Clue %TCft%.
Spiked Pit Trap (%DS% Deep): CR 2 (+1 per 20 feet of fall); %PT%, %AS% melee (1d4 spikes for $d4$ points of damage per successful hit); Reflex %RS% avoids falling; Search %SS%. Clue %TCft%.
Swinging Log Trap: CR 1; %AS% ranged ($S$/x2 crit); Search %SS%. Clue %TCct%. Activation %AT%.
Spiked Swinging Log Trap: CR 2; %AS% ranged ($S$x2, plus 1d4 spikes for $d4$ points of damage per spike); Reflex %RS% avoids; Search %SS%. Clue %TCct%. Activation %AT%.
Poison Needle Trap: CR 1; %AS% ranged (1, plus Poisoned); Reflex %RS% avoids being Poisoned; Search %SS%. Activation %AT%.
Poison Dust Trap: CR 1; no attack roll necessary ($S$, plus %PG%); Reflex %RS% avoids gas; Search %SS%. Activation %AT%.
Poison Gas Trap: CR 1; no attack roll necessary ($S$, plus %PG%); Gas remains active 1d4 rounds; Reflex %RS% avoids gas; Search %SS%. Activation %AT%.
Hail of Needles: CR 1; %AS% ranged ($S$); Search %SS%. Activation %AT%.
Scything Blade Trap: CR 1; %AS% melee $S$/x2; Reflex %RS% avoids critical damage; Search %SS%. Clue %TCst%. Activation %AT%.

Portcullis Trap: CR 1; %AS% melee $S$/x2; Reflex %RS% avoids critical damage; Note: Damage applies only to those underneath the portcullis. Portcullis blocks passageway. Search %SS%. Clue %TCpt%. Activation %AT%.
trigger is on a hair trigger. Those probing with a 10 foot pole could avoid the trap. The trigger is a %TD%
trigger is well maintained. Activate on the first in line. The trigger is a %TD%
trigger is keyed for the second activation. The trigger is a %TD%
trigger is unreliable. Use marching order to determine when it activates. The trigger is a %TD%
trigger is old. Use marching order to determine when it activates. The trigger is a %TD%
trigger is old and unreliable. Use marching order to determine when it activates. The trigger is a %TD%
trigger is fragile and breaks after activation. Use marching order to determine when it activates. The trigger is a %TD%

hallucinatory gas scrambles the mind and senses. All Intelligence and Wisdom checks made suffer Disadvantage.
weakening gas. All Strength and Dexterity checks made suffer Disadvantage.
dusty gas. Visibility is reduced to 1 foot and creaures gain Blinded condition.
stinging pepper gas. Visibility is reduced to 1 foot and creaures gain Stunned condition.
foul poisoned gas. Creaures gain Poisoned condition.
The bottom is a hard floor. No attack roll necessary to hit the floor, take 1d6 bludgeoning damage for every ten feet fallen
The bottom is filled debris and the skeletal remains of an earlier traveler. No attack roll necessary to hit the floor, take 1d6 bludgeoning damage for every ten feet fallen

The bottom is filled with a shallow pool of acid (DC15 Dexterity check to cling feebly to cracks or take 2d6 acid damage per round). Lucky the acid broke your fall, take half damage for falling (1d6 bludgeoning for every ten feet fallen)

The bottom is filled with a deep pool of %WT% water (DC10 Strength swim check to move 5 feet where failure sinks 5 feet and begins drowning). Your pack or armor might weight you down see the rules for swiming in armor
The bottom is filled with quicksand (DC10 Strength swim check to move 5 feet where failure sinks 5 feet and begins drowning)
The bottom is filled with tar (DC15 Strength swim check to move 5 feet where failure sinks 5 feet and begins drowning. An open flame will ignite the tar causing fire 1d6 damage every round

The bottom contains a gelatinous cube (DC15 Dexterity check to avoid landing on it and being immediately engulfed), take 1d6 bludgeoning damage for every ten feet fallen. Try and avoid being engulfed if you can see it

The bottom contains a black pudding (DC15 Dexterity check to avoid landing directly on it), take 1d6 bludgeoning damage for every ten feet fallen. There are cracks running down the face of the wall that you can navigate with a successful climb check. The black pudding follows
The bottom contains a %CS%, take 1d6 bludgeoning damage for every ten feet fallen. The creature is %CA%

There is are bones. It is an old, skeleton. Missing some bones but looks to have been stabbed
There is are bones. It is an old, skull. Looks to have been stabbed in the face
There some scraps and debris. It is clothing, an old shirt. Looks pierced through and shows old, dried blood
There some scraps. It is clothing, an old pant leg. Looks pierced through and shows old, dried blood
There some scraps. It is clothing, an old pack. It does not look servicable. It apears to have been pierced through the back
There some scraps. It is clothing, an old hat. Looks pierced through and shows old, dried blood
There some scraps. It is clothing, an old cap. Looks pierced through and shows old, dried blood
There some scraps. It is an old helm. It does not look servicable. Looks pierced through and shows old, dried blood
There some scraps. It is part of an old %TCpta%. It does not look servicable. Yep, it pierced through the %TCptb% and shows old, dried blood

There is a shoe lying about that has a bloody hole in the sole
The are a pair of discarded boots. The toe has a hole in one and a hole in the heel of the other
There is old blood on the floor leading to the their entrance. It appears that someone step in blood and left a track
The floor shows some old blood splatters. It is a pooling of blood
There is a toe on the floor. It is the big toe and looks decayed
There is a toe on the floor. They appear to be the little toes and look decayed
There is a bone on the floor. It appears to be someone's big toe
There is an old hat lying about. No sign of the owner
There is an old cap lying about. No sign of the owner
There is an battered helm lying about. No sign of the owner
There is an pack lying about. It contains some decayed rations
There is a busted grappling hook. It does not look servicable as the tines are bent
There is a short, loose line of rope. It is old and does not look servicable. The end is frayed and the rest of it can not be found
There is an sword lying about. It is old, rusted. The tip has snapped off
There are some marks on the floor. They are scraches. You notice an old finger nail and dried blood
A spike has been nailed into the floor
There is are bones. It is a skeletal hand. It looks severed. Must have been called lefty
There is are bones. It is a skeletal foot but no sign of the owner. It looks severed. He must be called shorty
There is are bones. It is a skeletal arm. It looks severed. Someone is probably missing it
There is are bones. It is a skeletal leg. It looks severed. What did he do? walk away
It looks like there is a body part. It is an old, decayed hand. A ring was removed from the finger. It looks severed.
Someone left something behind. There is an old, decayed foot lying on the floor. Anyone need one boot. It looks severed
It appears there is a body part here. There is an old, decayed arm. It looks severed. It almost looks as if it was pointing
It looks like there is a body part here. There is an old,decayed leg. It looks severed
There is are bones. It is a skeletal hand. It looks crushed. Must have been called lefty
There is are bones. It is a skeletal foot but no sign of the owner. It looks crushed. He must be called shorty
There is are bones. It is a skeletal arm. It looks crushed. Someone is probably missing it
There is are bones. It is a skeletal leg. It looks crushed. What did he do? walk away
It looks like there is a body part. It is an old, decayed hand. A ring was removed from the finger. It looks crushed.
Someone left something behind. There is an old, decayed foot lying on the floor. Anyone need one boot. It looks crushed
It appears there is a body part here. There is an old, decayed arm. It looks crushed. It almost looks as if it was pointing
It looks like there is a body part here. There is an old,decayed leg. It looks crushed
